COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4
STRING: I left Torta at the cafeteria and wandered about the
campus for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a
STRING: While I was doing so, I thought about that girl who
called herself Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120
STRING: First year students that had regular classes would still
have been in class at this time of day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: I knew that Lise wouldn't be in the Old Wing, but I
ended up going there anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: The leaves on the trees caught much of the rain, and I
barely got wet on my way there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: There was no way to hear her singing, even if I were to
focus my hearing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: But even then I felt like going inside, and so I went all
the way in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba
STRING: The music rooms here were old, and in some places
scratches and other damage stood out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: The building itself was still quite sturdy, and there
seemed to be no particular need for concern.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc
STRING: The only problem was probably that the acoustic
conditions were not really up to scratch.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2
STRING: Still, not many people came here, so it was unlikely that
it would be too noisy to practice properly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208
STRING: [Chris] “Well then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e
STRING: As I had expected, Lise wasn't here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: But, in a sudden moment of impulse, I decided to set up
my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: Although I was aware that it wasn't the time or place to
be doing this, I had already decided what song I would
play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256
STRING: I didn't have the score on me, but it was all in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276
STRING: [Chris] “It started off... Something like this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0
STRING: I was able to play it better than I thought I would.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: Since it was a song that placed great importance on the
vocals, playing as I did now made it feel more like an
accompaniment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328
STRING: After practicing the song a few times over, I felt like I
heard something behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Hello, Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39a
STRING: I wasn't exactly sure how I should speak to her, so for
the time being I just spoke politely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: However, she just stood by the door, staring at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: At least, it didn't seem like she was going to run away
like last time, so I continued speaking a little more
casually.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: [Chris] “You heard me playing, huh? But it's my fault for
leaving the door open; you can ignore me if you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43c
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry... I was just teasing you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45a
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Oh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x470
STRING: [Chris] “But, how was it? I thought I played it fairly well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ac
STRING: [Lise] “U-Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c2
STRING: She made a slightly perplexed face, and in the end she
didn't tell me what she thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: [Lise] “But, that song just now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f6
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Oh, yeah, I memorized it when I heard it
the other day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: I really wasn't sure what I should talk about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54a
STRING: I imagined it would have been a little different if we
could have just done an ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x560
STRING: It was the same with Phorni too, but music had the
power to enrich people's hearts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x576
STRING: For example, even in the case of a poor performance,
there were things that could be felt and experienced
through it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58c
STRING: [Chris] “Would you like to sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: I made the suggestion to her casually, trying not to be
pushy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d4
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Ah... B-But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Chris] “What do you say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: [Lise] “N-No...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64a
STRING: I shouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x656
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay. That's too bad, but, oh well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x688
STRING: [Lise] “I... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69e
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry about it. Anyway, I guess I'm in the
way. I didn't mean to take your spot, but it looks like I
did, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c8
STRING: I tried to be nice, as she had apologized again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d4
STRING: I was surprised at myself and how effortlessly the words
had come out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: I had always disliked talking to new people, and yet
here I was being kind to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: Perhaps it was because she seemed to dislike talking to
new people even more than I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x702
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, I don't wish to impose, so I'll be going
now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: It was only by just a little, but I felt I had gotten closer
to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: And despite the fact it had nothing to do with my
search for a recital partner, it made me happy for some
reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: It seemed like it would be hard to rehearse with her,
but I wondered if I would get the chance to do so
before graduating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75e
STRING: I opened my Fortelle case, and when I was preparing to
pack up the foldable stand, Lise spoke to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: [Lise] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: [Chris] “Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: [Lise] “You don't, umm... Need to be so polite...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x806
STRING: I'm only
a first year student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x812
STRING: [Chris] “Oh? That's good to hear, I'm not very used to it
anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x828
STRING: I ceased what I was doing and responded to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x850
STRING: [Lise] “That... Would be easier for me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x866
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87c
STRING: Did that mean she didn't mind if I spoke to her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x888
STRING: Even if we couldn't do an ensemble, it was clear that
she had opened up to me just a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89e
STRING: It might be worth trying to speak to her a little more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8aa
STRING: [Chris] “Are you going to be practicing here all day,
Lise...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8dc
STRING: [Lise] “I'm not here for practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f2
STRING: [Chris] “Were you going to sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: [Lise] “Yes...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: Ah... I mean, I was just about to leave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, but if I'm really in the way, I'll just head off.
Don't worry about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99a
STRING: [Lise] “N-No, you're not in the way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c8
STRING: This place can be
used by anyone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f6
STRING: You're my senior... So there's
no need for you to leave...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa02
STRING: [Chris] “Senior?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: [Lise] “You're... A third year student... Right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Chris] “Ahh, yeah, that's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa60
STRING: Right... I suppose that she was my junior in that sense.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: I barely spoke to the people in my course at it was, so
naturally I didn't know anyone in the lower grades.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: So I was just a little surprised when she suddenly
referred to me as her senior.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: [Chris] “In that case... There's no need for you to go
anywhere, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Lise] “That's true, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae0
STRING: [Chris] “If the sound of my Fortelle is the problem, I'll
just go to the next classroom.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: [Lise] “I... You don't have to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb32
STRING: [Chris] “It's fine, you should practice your singing, since
you're here and all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb48
STRING: I started packing up again and put my Fortelle in its
case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: I heard Lise say something in a small voice a number of
times as she was standing behind me fidgeting
nervously, but it didn't seem as if she was going to
leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb74
STRING: I closed the case on my Fortelle and slung it over my
shoulder along with my bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I hope to see you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: [Lise] “Huh... Oh... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: It seemed as if she had answered without thinking, so I
guessed it wasn't going to happen today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbec
STRING: Still, I had the feeling we might be able to rehearse
together, sooner or later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfa
STRING: Thinking about if or when that might happen, I moved
to the next classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: [Chris] “Would you look at that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc54
STRING: The next classroom was actually completely the same
as the room I was just in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc60
STRING: I think the name plate in the hallway had 'Music Room B'
written on it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc76
STRING: It appeared that this floor of the Old Wing had four
music rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8c
STRING: The rooms were next to each other in a line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: I had a feeling that I just understood why the New
Wing had been built.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca4
STRING: [Chris] “Well then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: I had told Lise that I was going to practice in the next
room, but I felt hesitant to practice the same song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd0
STRING: And just when I was considering leaving without doing
any more practice, I heard a familiar voice from the next
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf6
STRING: [Lise] “As if right in the corner of the classroom...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0c
STRING: The walls weren't particularly thick.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd18
STRING: Listening carefully, I almost felt like Lise was right there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2e
STRING: [Lise] “Without any words...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd44
STRING: I considered playing my Fortelle to the tune of her song,
but then I realized that if I did that now, she'd probably
panic and leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd64
STRING: [Chris] “But even so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7a
STRING: I suppose “inexpensive” was a nice way to put it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: The building was definitely sturdy, but I could easily
imagine the chaos that would occur if people were
playing music in every room at the same time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9c
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: Perhaps this was alright, as I was able to hear Lise
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: I decided not to go home just yet, and sat myself down
in a nearby chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: My Fortelle was all set up by the time Lise had finished
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde0
STRING: It wouldn't have felt right to play Lise's song, so I started
playing the song that Phorni and I often practiced
together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: Playing the song just to pass the time, I didn't pay much
attention to the other sounds around me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: When I realized that I'd been playing for a while, it was
already dark outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe62
STRING: I removed my fingers from the keys, and stretched my
arms above my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6e
STRING: While stretching like this, I twisted my torso to one side,
and my eyes met with Lise's, who was half hiding
behind the door that I'd left open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: [Lise] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, Lise. You're finished?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: It seemed that she had already packed up and was
ready to go home, as she was holding her bag tight
while she answered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going to head home now, too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Lise] “Um... Have a nice night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf98
STRING: Saying only this, she ran off down the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: Lise would probably come back here again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd0
STRING: What should I...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfea
STRING: What course of action should I take?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff6
STRING: There's no way I could ask her to partner up with me,
not without having done an ensemble first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100e
STRING: Even so... I started imagining this and that about what
could happen if we were to do an ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: I still had over a month to choose a partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1032
STRING: It's not exactly a long time, but if worst came to worst,
Ms. Cordell said she would find someone for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: I wasn't going to mind if that's how things turned out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1056
STRING: In fact, that may have suited me better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: Going over these things in my head, I started packing
up my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107c
STRING: In trying to increase distance between myself and Torta,
was I not getting closer to someone else instead?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1092
STRING: The doubt was growing in my mind, but telling myself
the excuse that if it was for the sake of rehearsal it was
okay, I left the music room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d0
STRING: By the time I realized, it was almost night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10dc
STRING: I had grown used to seeing the starless sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: Blocking the falling rain with the palm of my hand, I
wiped away the droplets running down my forehead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1116
STRING: I held my Fortelle case under my arm so that it wouldn't
get too wet, and weaved through the thickly grown
trees as I made my way home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1162
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1178
STRING: The song didn't come out as well as I thought it would.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1184
STRING: It was a simple song, almost like an accompaniment,
but there were a number of places where I hadn't been
able to move my fingers well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119a
STRING: Probably due to my general lack of practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c6
STRING: Just when I was thinking of playing it one more time, I
felt like I heard something behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11dc
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1210
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1242
STRING: [Lise] “I'm so s-sorry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1258
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... No no, sorry for bothering you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128a
STRING: [Lise] “I-I'll be going now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c8
STRING: Quickly saying goodbye, she ran off down the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12de
STRING: I wanted to talk to her a little if it were possible, but I
didn't even get the chance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f4
STRING: [Chris] “Guess there was nothing I could do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: From the very beginning, she hadn't been that friendly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1316
STRING: She had said she hated crowds, so it was easy to
imagine that this was her favorite place at school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132c
STRING: And in that place, some guy she didn't know suddenly
shows up, and starts using it as a place to play his
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1342
STRING: That would have bothered just about anyone...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134e
STRING: I didn't feel like practicing anymore, so I started packing
up my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1364
STRING: I probably shouldn't come back here anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: It wouldn't be fair if she stopped coming here because
of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ae
STRING: Although I still had a sense of attachment towards her
voice, I knew that this was what I should do, so I
headed out and left the Old Wing behind me.
